oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show 1948-04-29 Disc #7 & 8
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Multiple recordings of the Hank Thompson Radio Show. Original recording date is April 29, 1948. Thompson is backed by his Brazos Valley Boys. Recordings are labeled as Disc #7 and Disc #8 respectfully.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Dew Drop on the Flowers (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (02:18) Along the Trial to Dripping Springs (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (04:39) Anytime (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (07:01) Those Dark Clouds Don't Bother Me (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (08:56) Picture on the Wall (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (11:46) That Beautiful Picture (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (14:22) Sweeter than the Flowers (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (16:19) Rockin' Alone in an Old Rocking Chair (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (19:14) Teardrops in My Heart (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (21:40) The Green Light (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (23:26) The Nine-Pound Hammer (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (25:08) When It's Round-up Time in Heaven (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank;
